ivardefs.name: amount
ivardefs.desc: The amount calculated for this component.

ivardefs.name: code
ivardefs.desc: A code that identifies the component. Codes may be used to differentiate between kinds of taxes, surcharges, discounts etc.

ivardefs.name: factor
ivardefs.desc: The factor that has been applied on the base price for calculating this component.

ivardefs.name: type
ivardefs.desc: This code identifies the type of the component.

properties.desc: The price for a ChargeItem may be calculated as a base price with surcharges/deductions that apply in certain conditions. A ChargeItemDefinition resource that defines the prices, factors and conditions that apply to a billing code is currently under devel
